data.trans: Trình bày, giải thích, cho thấy (bằng số liệu, bằng chứng)
data.trans_hint: Ứng viên đã cho thấy rằng cô ấy là một chuyên gia về tiếp thị.
data.en_hint: The candidate demonstrated that she was an expert in marketing.
data.content_game_1: The candidate demonstrated that she was an expert in marketing.
data.answer_en_hint: The candidate demonstrated that she was an expert in marketing.

data.trans: Sự quả quyết, quyết tâm, quyết định
data.trans_hint: Sự quyết tâm, kỹ năng làm việc nhóm và khả năng lãnh đạo của cô ấy đã thuyết phục chúng tôi rằng cô ấy là người phù hợp nhất cho công việc.
data.en_hint: Her determination, teamwork skills and leadership capabilities convinced us that she was the most suitable one for the job.
data.content_game_1: Her determination, teamwork skills and leadership capabilities convinced us that she was the most suitable one for the job.
data.answer_en_hint: Her determination, teamwork skills and leadership capabilities convinced us that she was the most suitable one for the job.

data.trans: Làm nổi bật lên, nêu bật
data.trans_hint: Sơ yếu lý lịch của bạn nên làm nổi bật các kỹ năng và thành tích của bạn.
data.en_hint: Your CV should highlight your skills and achievements.
data.content_game_1: Your CV should highlight your skills and achievements.
data.answer_en_hint: Your CV should highlight your skills and achievements.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi thuê một vũ công chuyên nghiệp để dàn dựng phần trình diễn cho chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: We hire a professional dancer to choreograph our performance.
data.content_game_1: We hire a professional dancer to choreograph our performance.
data.answer_en_hint: We hire a professional dancer to choreograph our performance.

data.trans_hint: Ứng viên lý tưởng sẽ có ít nhất một năm kinh nghiệm liên quan.
data.en_hint: The ideal candidate will have at least one year of related experience.
data.content_game_1: The ideal candidate will have at least one year of related experience.
data.answer_en_hint: The ideal candidate will have at least one year of related experience.

data.trans_hint: Ứng viên phù hợp sẽ cần có kinh nghiệm về dịch vụ, có kiến thức chuyên sâu về điều dưỡng và các kĩ năng giao tiếp.
data.en_hint: The suitable candidate will have experience of the service, an in-depth knowledge of nursing and communication skills.
data.content_game_1: The suitable candidate will have experience of the service, an in-depth knowledge of nursing and communication skills.
data.answer_en_hint: The suitable candidate will have experience of the service, an in-depth knowledge of nursing and communication skills.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi được yêu cầu chờ ở sảnh để phỏng vấn.
data.en_hint: We were requested to wait in the lobby for the interview.
data.content_game_1: We were requested to wait in the lobby for the interview.
data.answer_en_hint: We were requested to wait in the lobby for the interview.

data.trans_hint: Ông Muro muốn bà Hoa đưa ra quyết định tuyển dụng.
data.en_hint: Mr. Muro wants Ms. Hoa to make a hiring decision.
data.content_game_1: Mr. Muro wants Ms. Hoa to make a hiring decision.
data.answer_en_hint: Mr. Muro wants Ms. Hoa to make a hiring decision.

data.trans_hint: Dora luôn thuê những người thợ giỏi vì cô ấy nắm bắt rất nhanh về khả năng của mọi người.
data.en_hint: Dora always hires good workers because she is very perceptive about people's abilities.
data.content_game_1: Dora always hires good workers because she is very perceptive about people's abilities.
data.answer_en_hint: Dora always hires good workers because she is very perceptive about people's abilities.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi muốn xây dựng một nền tảng việc làm cho sinh viên Việt Nam.
data.en_hint: We want to create a career platform for Vietnamese students.
data.content_game_1: We want to create a career platform for Vietnamese students.
data.answer_en_hint: We want to create a career platform for Vietnamese students.

data.trans: Đủ điều kiện, đủ khả năng (tham dự hay đi tiếp)
data.trans_hint: Để đủ điều kiện cho công việc này, bạn phải sống ở đất nước này ít nhất ba năm.
data.en_hint: To qualify for this job, you must have lived in this country for at least three years.
data.content_game_1: To qualify for this job, you must have lived in this country for at least three years.
data.answer_en_hint: To qualify for this job, you must have lived in this country for at least three years.
